I have sent out email to some of my hoy customers, but thought it only fair that I post these up here to give everyone a chance to pick up one of the hoy cards.

Below is the pricing and card images.

first come first serve, let me know what you would like.

sgc 10 hoy throwing   SOLD

You can call or email to discuss payment arrangements.

Thanks

Dave
